message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. What do you think?
Bob, I understand your position, but $900,000 is significantly below its true value.  I could consider coming down to $1,050,000. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1,050,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1,025,000. This is my final offer
